title: High History of the Holy Grail
description: Here is an ancient tale of High Romance, the substance of which in one form or another has intrigued and fascinated men and women for well nigh a thousand years, not only in our own land but also across the seas. Nothing it would appear can kill the Arthurian Saga.Generation after generation has inspired and entertained by the legends of the Hero-King, his Knights of the Round Table, the reputed visit of Joseph of Arimathea, the mysterious coming of the Holy Grail, and the planting of the Holy Thorn.The spell is still upon this ancient place. In our day young men and maidens dig to uncover the secrets of Avalon and traces of the "Once and Future King".
author: Sebastian Evans
